MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DD6 postcode area of Wormit. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 8:53AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of on site complications and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2PM. If this information changes then we will make every effort to contact you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:50AM on 24 October 2020.
